comments.body: Do we also want `sig-node` approvers to be approvers here? Only 4 people in the `approvers` group strikes me as slightly small... especially in the 1-2 yr future when maybe this isn't being actively worked on, engs have left companies, etc...
IIUC approvals are hierarchical, so any kubelet owner or kubelet/cm owner can also approve topology manager change.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@# See the OWNERS docs at https://go.k8s.io/owners

approvers:
- ConnorDoyle
- derekwaynecarr
